docs.text:
Intro


Welcome to the documentation and development site for 
Zephyr
: an open-source seismic FWI toolkit. 
Zephyr
 is designed to offer a convenient, easy-to-use set of tools and components that enable seismic Full-Waveform Inversion. Most importantly, 
Zephyr
 is free and open-source, so you can use it for your own projects and/or contribute to its development. 
Zephyr
 continues to gain features and improve daily.
